languages.text: "Если убийство семьи избавит тебя от сомнений, то сделай это".

traits.locale_text: "Если убийство семьи избавит тебя от сомнений, то сделай это".

languages.text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."
languages.original_text: "Если убийство семьи избавит тебя от сомнений, то сделай это".

traits.locale_text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."
"If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."

"If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."

languages.text: «Si matar a su familia puede aliviar el peso de sus dudas, entonces hágalo».
languages.original_text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."

traits.locale_text: «Si matar a su familia puede aliviar el peso de sus dudas, entonces hágalo».

languages.text: 「家族を殺すことで疑念が晴れるのなら、そうすればいい」
languages.original_text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."

traits.locale_text: 「家族を殺すことで疑念が晴れるのなら、そうすればいい」

languages.text: “如果杀死你的家人就能消除你的疑虑，那就放手去做吧。”
languages.original_text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."

traits.locale_text: “如果杀死你的家人就能消除你的疑虑，那就放手去做吧。”

languages.text: "Wenn der Tod Eurer Familie Eure Zweifel zerstreut, dann tötet sie."
languages.original_text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn der Tod Eurer Familie Eure Zweifel zerstreut, dann tötet sie."

languages.text: « Si tuer votre famille vous aidera à dissiper vos doutes, alors faites-le. »
languages.original_text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."

traits.locale_text: « Si tuer votre famille vous aidera à dissiper vos doutes, alors faites-le. »

languages.text: "Aileni öldürmek seni kuşkularından azat edecekse devam et."
languages.original_text: "If killing your family will relieve you of your doubts, then do it."
